#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int n,a[1000],i,s,j,rep,ans;

long long int binrep(long long int n)
{
 i = 0,s = 0;
 while(n)
 {
 a[i++] = n%2;
 n = n/2;
 }

 i--;
 while(i>=0)
 {
 s = s*10;
 s = s+a[i];
 i--;
 }
 return s;
}


int main() {
	// your code goes here
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	rep = binrep(n);
	ans = 0;
	while(rep)
	{
	  if(rep%10)
	   ans++;
	   rep = rep/10;
	}
	
	printf("%lld\n",ans);
	return 0;
}
